personal.name: Jhon Danver C. Abogado
personal.title: Certified HTML and CSS Developer
personal.summary: Design here, design there, design everywhere! I am a passionate and certified HTML and CSS developer with a knack for creating visually stunning and user-friendly web interfaces. With a strong foundation in web design principles and a keen eye for detail, I specialize in transforming ideas into captivating digital experiences. My expertise lies in crafting responsive layouts, optimizing user interactions, and ensuring seamless cross-browser compatibility. I thrive in collaborative environments, working closely with designers and developers to bring concepts to life. Whether it's building sleek landing pages or complex web applications, I am dedicated to delivering high-quality code that not only meets but exceeds client expectations. Let's connect and explore how I can contribute to your next web development project!
personal.elevator_pitch: I like to design things that make people's lives easier and more enjoyable. With my skills in HTML and CSS, I can create beautiful and functional web pages that provide a great user experience. I'm passionate about staying up-to-date with the latest design trends and technologies, and I'm always looking for new ways to improve my craft. Whether it's working on a small personal project or collaborating with a team on a large-scale website, I bring creativity, attention to detail, and a strong work ethic to every project I take on.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.company_context: 200+ employee fintech startup, Series B funding
experience.team_structure: Engineering team of 25, direct reports: 3 junior developers

achievements_star.situation: Legacy monolith causing 3-second page load times affecting user retention
achievements_star.task: Lead architectural redesign to improve performance
achievements_star.action: Implemented microservices architecture using Docker, Kubernetes, and Redis caching
achievements_star.result: Reduced load times by 40% to 1.8s, increased user retention by 15%, saved $50K annually in server costs

leadership_examples: Coordinated with product and design teams

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.thesis_project: Scholarship Monitoring System with Data Analytics

projects_portfolio.name: Scholarship Monitoring System with Data Analytics
projects_portfolio.description: Comprehensive system for tracking and analyzing scholarship distributions and student performance metrics
projects_portfolio.impact: Streamlined scholarship management process and provided data-driven insights for academic institutions

career_goals.short_term: Senior UI/UX Designer or Front-end Developer at innovative tech company
career_goals.long_term: Design Lead or Head of Creative at a design-focused organization

behavioral: Tell me about a design project where you had to balance aesthetics with functionality

How do you handle tight deadlines while maintaining design quality?
technical: Walk me through your approach to creating responsive web designs

situational: A client requests a major design change after you've completed the project. How do you respond?
How would you approach designing for users with different accessibility needs?
Describe how you would evaluate and implement a new design trend in your work

preparation_questions: What excites you about our product?
Why do you want to work here?
What questions do you have for us?
